snippet.title: Actress Jordana Brewster Selling Hollywood Home Once Owned By Ellen Degeneres
snippet.description: ‘The Fast and the Furious’ actress Jordana Brewster is selling her stunning Hollywood home for $3,795,000. Property records show that the Brazilian-American actress paid $3,375,000 for the 3 bedroom, 4 bathroom, 2,868 square foot architectural stunner in March 2011. Long before Brewster called the place home, Ellen DeGeneres walked the halls of [...] read »

snippet.title: Hollywood & Swine Skewers Hollywood
snippet.description: More than a few movie moguls and mega-stars have slammed into the intersection of Hollywood & Swine – the home of more EXCLUSIVES than any entertainment news site in history – particularly at Oscar time. There’s a reason for that. It’s the Onion of the showbiz world. Peel back the layers [...] read »

snippet.title: EMC​Voice: Big Data Predicts Big Winners In Sports, Politics And Hollywood
snippet.description: By Erin Richey How did your Academy Awards pool turn out this year? Did you accurately predict Jared Leto for Best Supporting Actor and Cate Blanchett for Best Actress? Chances are if you laid your bets based on data from past award ceremonies, social media and prediction markets, your picks won. Big [...] read »
